summary: AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION FAILURE.  CARS TRANSMISSIONS FOR 6 MONTHS HAS BEEN SHIFTING ERRATIC, HARD, SURGING, DOWNSHIFTING WITHOUT NOTICE AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS, AND SLIPPING.  CAR ONLY HAS 13K OF MILES AND NOW IS IN AT THE DEALER FOR A NEW TRANNY.  THERE ARE MANY REPORTS OF THIS FAILURE AND A FEW FATALITIES IT SEEMS.  THIS ISSUE NEEDS TO BE RESOLVED FAST.  I PLAN TO DITCH THIS CAR IN THE NEXT 6 MONTHS BECAUSE IT JUST DOESN'T FEEL SAFE ANYMORE TO DRIVE.  EVEN THE REPLACEMENT TRANNYS ARE DIEING.
